channel.title: Healthcare Industry Insights
channel.description: Healthcare industry insights, market analysis, and expert perspectives on the evolving healthcare landscape.
channel.itunes:author: Reggie Yang
channel.itunes:summary: Healthcare industry insights, market analysis, and expert perspectives on the evolving healthcare landscape.

item.title: Episode 1: Enhertu Redrawing the Breast Cancer Map
item.description: An in-depth analysis of Enhertu's breakthrough impact on breast cancer treatment, exploring market dynamics, clinical outcomes, and industry implications for oncology therapeutics.
item.itunes:summary: An in-depth analysis of Enhertu's breakthrough impact on breast cancer treatment, exploring market dynamics and industry implications.

item.title: Episode 2: AstraZeneca's Strategic Roadmap in Breast Cancer
item.description: An in-depth analysis of AstraZeneca's strategic roadmap in breast cancer, exploring market dynamics, clinical outcomes, and industry implications for oncology therapeutics.
item.itunes:summary: An in-depth analysis of AstraZeneca's strategic roadmap in breast cancer, exploring market dynamics and industry implications.
